Name: The Devil In Me
Ingredients: 10 ml Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Plum sake, chilli spice and maraschino cherry delicately flavour cognac in this stirred, boozy after-dinner cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Grant Murray at Bar One, Inverness, Scotland.
Nutrition: One serving of The Devil In Me contains 169 calories
